td.p: North West Company. Agreement 1804 and Agreement 1802. An electronic transcription. MFTP #0027

div.p: -tories made thereof; for all which said property or proportion of such Retiring Partner therein the said Concern shall not be bound to account until one year after the accounts thereof shall be closed. That every Partner so retiring from the Concern is hereby considered to be subject to the same observances of and compliance with all the matters Rules & Regulations herein contained touching & concerning the said trade & Commerce & in case of contravention thereto equally liable to the Penalties herein expressed as if he still Continued an active Partner[.] That every Partner retiring from the concern except those who shall by misconduct or otherwise forfeit their shares & Interest therein which thereupon revert to and become the property of the Concern as herein before mentioned, shall release assign and make over to the remaining Partners in the Concern or their attornies herein before named for the Benefit and Behoof of the whole or to such Person or Persons as shall with the Consent of the said Concern have been agreed to be admitted a Partner or Partners therein th in the Room and Place of such retiring Partner then holds and or may be entitled to hold in the said concern Reserving to him the Right to demand have and receive of and from the said Concern for and during the space of Seven years from and after the space time of his so retiring if the concern shall so long continue and be accounted for & paid to him by the said McTavish Frobisher & Company an equivalent to on half of the nett produce if the shares & Interest be held in the
